Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the creation of a centralized system for processing freedom of information law requests
Items.MatterName: Creation of a centralized system for processing freedom of information law requests.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing an office of algorithmic accountability
Items.MatterName: Establishing an office of algorithmic accountability.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing basic compliance standards for the use of artificial intelligence by city agencies
Items.MatterName: Establishing basic compliance standards for the use of artificial intelligence by city agencies.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring a list of artificial intelligence systems that have been assessed by the office of algorithmic accountability
Items.MatterName: Requiring a list of artificial intelligence systems that have been assessed by the office of algorithmic accountability.
